message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, it holds a significant worth of $12000 to you. I am offering this remarkable item to you at a special introductory price of $13500. This offer is designed to provide you with a unique chance to own something truly extraordinary at a price slightly above its intrinsic value to you. I look forward to your consideration and hope to facilitate this transaction with you soon. If you have any questions or need more information, please do not hesitate to reach out.
